previewArticle.title: Germany vs. Ghana: 2014 FIFA World Cup | Group G Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Germany 2, Ghana 2: 2014 FIFA World Cup | Group G Match Recap

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.
Kwadwo Asamoah (Ghana) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Sami Khedira (Germany).

timelineItems.name: 천사~
timelineItems.text: Germany, these are fricken amazing passes #GERvGHA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Toni Kroos (Germany) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Thomas Müller.

timelineItems.name: banafsheh ghassemi
timelineItems.text: Another David & Goliath match in the making...And so far those have been the best of the best in this cup. The Beautiful Game. #GERvGHA

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Mohammed Rabiu (Ghana).
Mesut Özil (Germany) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Bazzabhoy
timelineItems.text: That would've been a great goal! #GERvGHA #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: Yahzee Skellington
timelineItems.text: ... damn, Germany can play so good #GERvGHA #WorldCup

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Christian Atsu (Ghana) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Kevin-Prince Boateng.
Foul by Mario Götze (Germany).
Sulley Ali Muntari (Ghana) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Sal Cipriano
timelineItems.text: Love how these two teams stack up physically. If it ends in a tie they can settle it with a game of B-Ball or an MMA cage fight. #GERvGHA

timelineItems.name: Yahzee Skellington
timelineItems.text: ... two attempts now for Ghana... the game is getting hotter #GERvGHA #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: John McQ 76
timelineItems.text: Everytime I see Sami Khedira I just think Milan Baros with a Beard. #LFC #GERvGHA

timelineItems.name: Matt Oswin
timelineItems.text: Good save from Neuer as Ghana shoot from outside the box, a theme they started on Monday #WorldCup #GERvGHA

timelineItems.name: ZEÍN
timelineItems.text: Great save by Neuer! 0-0 #GERvGHA #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: C'est Moi 這是我 ™
timelineItems.text: One thing you can never fault Ghana for is enthusiasm and energy they’ll show throughout the game. They’ll keep coming at ya!!! #GERvGHA

timelineItems.name: Colin Clayton
timelineItems.text: Lovely open game this one #GERvGHA

timelineItems.name: ₡ØURŦ₦E¥

timelineItems.name: Nate Rathjen
timelineItems.text: Credit to Iran and Ghana for completely bringing it to their respective opponents. Perhaps Ghana can hold longer than 91 minutes. #GERvGHA

timelineItems.name: Benjamin Iannetta
timelineItems.text: Germany has not lost in a group stage match since 1986 #GERvGHA

timelineItems.text: ugh I wanna do the wave but I'm home alone and eating raisins and drinking bitburger #GERvGHA

timelineItems.name: Nick
timelineItems.text: Is it bad if I'm looking for red cards and injuries in this #GERvGHA game? #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Kevin-Prince Boateng (Ghana).
Philipp Lahm (Germany) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt missed. Miroslav Klose (Germany) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Philipp Lahm.

timelineItems.name: UFA
timelineItems.text: It would be criminal if #GERvGHA did not end in a draw. Amazing! #WorldCup #GroupOfDeath

timelineItems.name: Adetunji Adetomiwa
timelineItems.text: What a game of football,end to end #GERvGHA

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Germany. Conceded by Jonathan Mensah.

timelineItems.name: Brian McArdle
timelineItems.text: Apparently Neuer thinks he plays for the Harlem Globetrotters now... #GERvGHA

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Ghana. Emmanuel Badu tries a through ball, but Mubarak Wakaso is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: oladele fameso
timelineItems.text: I detest this Muntari guy....always stupidly complacent #GERvGHA #WordlCup

timelineItems.name: Scott Kotarides
timelineItems.text: Mesut Ozil has been #awful today #GERvGHA

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Sulley Ali Muntari (Ghana).
Bastian Schweinsteiger (Germany) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Sulley Ali Muntari (Ghana).
Toni Kroos (Germany) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: kenny
timelineItems.text: Jochen Loew should have gone to the stands for that intervention. #GERvGHA

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, Germany 2, Ghana 2.
